H0.text: Which rock star is known as 'The Boss'. Bruce Springsteen is excluded, so the next candidate is: Neil Young

H1.text: Which rock star is known as 'The Boss'. Eric Clapton

H2.text: Which rock star is known as 'The Boss'. Steven Tyler

H3.text: Which rock star is known as 'The Boss'. Springstein

A4.text: Springsteen acquired the nickname 'the Boss' during this period, since he took on the task of collecting his band's nightly pay and distributing it among his bandmates.
